name: The Amazing Universe of the Psychotrons!
name_original: The Amazing Universe of the Psychotrons!
description:
There is no game-over
and nothing to kill,
but endless secrets
will be revealed.
Welcome to “O'Psy Town”,
where the common sense denies
and blathering Psychotrons
will give you rhymes ...”

"The Amazing Universe of Psychotrons!" is an adventure point&click + drag&drop with  weird dialogues super surreal characters speaking in rapped rhymes.

You move Agent Plotkin a real #Slenderman, and you help him in the collecting of the neurons lost from the brain of a mad scientist, Professor Edgar Pavlita, his personal obsessions became "alive":  the Psychotrons and to deal with them is not easy.

The Game is an endless saucer full of secrets from counter cultures, from the "CHURCH-of-BOB" to #Discordianism, not to mention "Illuminatus!" Trilogy.

To access the game download the PDF manual  file  and the TXT with the password, the third download will bring you straight to the game.

The Amazing Universe of the Psychotrons is a “midnight game” for desktop screen, the use of mouse is preferable, we imagined and produced a game that you can play while you are watching the "rocky horror picture show" on the old TV set of your basement.

The full game - more than 100 quests - will be distributed only on physical support -usb pen- and will be playable off-line.
